SELECT ,T2.item_name as itemName ,T2.sku_code as skuCode, T2.color as color,T2.scale as scale,T2.buy_site as buySite,T2.sku_pic as skuPic,T1.`count` AS taskDailyCount,T1.id As taskDailyDetailId, T2.cost_price as costPrice,T2.discount,T2.purchase_price as purchasePrice, case T2.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM buyer_task_detail T1 left join item_sku T2 on T1.sku_id=T2.id where 1=1
and T1.buyer_id = #{buyerId}
and T2.item_name LIKE concat('%',#{itemName},'%')
and T2.buy_site LIKE concat('%',#{buySite},'%')
and T1.task_start_time<=NOW() and T1.task_end_time>= NOW() and T1.status=0 order by IFNULL(T2.buy_site, ''),trim(T2.item_name),T2.color,(T2.scale+0),scale_int

SELECT b.item_name as itemName,b.sku_pic as skuPic,b.sku_code as skuCode,b.upc,b.brand_name as brand,b.scale,a.count,c.title as taskTitle,c.gmt_create as gmtCreate,c.buyer_task_no as taskOrderNo,entry_count as inCount, case b.scale WHEN 'XXS' THEN 1 WHEN 'XS' THEN 2 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'L' THEN 5 WHEN 'XL' THEN 6 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 7 end as scale_int FROM buyer_task_detail a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_code=b.id LEFT JOIN buyer_task c ON a.buyer_task_no=c.id WHERE a.buyer_task_no=#{buyerTaskNo} ORDER BY trim(b.item_name),(b.scale+0),scale_int

SELECT ,T2.sku_pic as skuPic,T2.color as color, T2.scale as scaleInt FROM buyer_task_detail T1 LEFT JOIN item_sku T2 ON T1.sku_id=T2.id WHERE T1.task_id=#{taskId} ORDER BY IFNULL(T2.buy_site, ''),trim(T2.item_name),T2.color,(T2.scale+0),scaleInt
